    [Image] or [Truncated image[            Bcol      Ecol
L2
    [function]                              5         13
    [fact]                                  14        18
    [(]                                     19        20
    [n]                                     20        21
    [)]                                     21        22

    [if]                                    7         9
    [n]                                     10        11

    [return]                                9         15
    [1]                                     16        17

    [return]                                9         15
    [n]                                     16        17
    [*]                                     18        19
    [fact]                                  20        24
    [(]                                     24        25
    [n]                                     25        26

    [end]                                   5         8
L10
    [print]                                 5         10
